title: UK Royal Mail Main Logo
content:
I'm looking to identify the logo used for the Royal Mail's mail logo.

If anyone could help I'd be most grateful!

Thanks!

Doug

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Royal Mail Logo.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20120624050204/http:/typophile.com/files/Royal%20Mail%20Logo.jpg) | 5.51 KB |
author: dougneedsham

comments.content: Thanks, I saw that page, but was wondering if there was a font similar to [dubbeldik](http://web.archive.org/web/20120624050204/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/itfmecanorma/dubbeldik/) which comes with capital letters?

[Cobra](http://web.archive.org/web/20120624050204/http:/lineto.com/The+Fonts/Font+Categories/Graphic+Fonts/Cobra/) has even two sets of capitals – but then, also gaps/bridges with them.  
Check out [Bowfinprintworks’ Lined Font Guide](http://web.archive.org/web/20120624050204/http:/bowfinprintworks.com/LinedFontGuide01.html).

F
